faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Quick answers to common questions about our water solutions and services.

items.question: What types of water solutions do you provide?
items.answer: We provide premium water purification systems, filtration solutions, water coolers, dispensers, and comprehensive water quality testing services for homes, offices, and commercial establishments.

items.question: Do you offer installation and maintenance services?
items.answer: Yes, we provide complete installation services by our trained professionals. We also offer regular maintenance packages including filter replacements, system cleaning, and water quality checks.

items.question: How often should water filters be replaced?
items.answer: Filter replacement frequency depends on usage and water quality. Typically, filters should be replaced every 3-6 months. Our maintenance team will recommend an appropriate schedule based on your needs.

items.question: Do you provide water testing services?
items.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive water quality testing to check for contaminants, minerals, pH levels, and overall water safety. We provide detailed reports and recommend appropriate solutions.

items.question: What areas do you serve?
items.answer: We serve customers across Dubai and the UAE. Our team provides prompt delivery, installation, and maintenance services to residential and commercial clients throughout the region.

items.question: Are your water purification systems certified?
items.answer: Yes, all our water purification systems meet international quality standards and are certified by relevant health and safety authorities ensuring the highest water quality.

items.question: What makes Dr. Aqua different from other providers?
items.answer: Our combination of premium products, expert installation, responsive customer service, and commitment to water quality sets us apart. We provide complete water solutions, not just products.

items.question: Do you work with both residential and commercial clients?
items.answer: Yes, we serve both residential homes and commercial establishments of all sizes. We tailor our water solutions to match your specific requirements and usage patterns.
